text: ruguo nimen zai luxing zhong (jiedai), erqie meiyou dai shu de ren, namo, ke jiao chu diya pin; ruguo nimen zhong you yiren xintuo ling yiren, namo, shou xintuo de ren, dang jiao chu ta suo shou de xintuo wu, dang jingwei zhenzhu ──ta de zhu. Nimen buyao yinhui jianzheng, shei yinhui jianzheng, shei de xin que shi youzui de. Zhenzhu shi quanzhi nimen de xingwei de.
